ConceptDef.label: Bloodstones and Offerings
ConceptDef.helpText: Bloodstones are tokens of favour from the Revian blood god. \nWhenever a Revia sacrifices a humanlike corpse in the name of the blood god at a sacrificial spot, a Bloodstone is produced. \nRight-click a Bloodstone to make an offering, and perhaps the blood god will grant a blessing...
